appendJsonValue

public static void appendJsonValue(IndentedWriter writer,
                                   PropertyContext propertyContext,
                                   boolean quote)
Appends VariableNames.getValueVariable() to the StringBuilder holding the JSON serialization data. Use this method only for non-null values of VariableNames.getValueVariable().

Parameters:

propertyContext -
quote - Whether to quote the value.
